Docs.summary: Specifies the theme class an activity designer uses on the workflow design surface. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Theme classes specify a set of properties that determine the appearance of an activity when it is placed on a workflow design surface. Activity-designer developers can associate a theme class to a designer by declaring a Theme attribute for the designer. The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> class defines the declarative Theme attribute, including the argument that must be passed in the attribute, and all of its properties.
